EmailTemplate.name: HWBR-202303-EMP-VCT-PRIMARY-CARE-WEBINAR.Invite #1 (Webinar: Refresh your benefi
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Refresh your benefits strategy with primary care
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar Refresh your benefits strategy with primary care Wednesday, March 22 I 2 p.m. Eastern A recent survey shows that the majority of U.S. employers are reconsidering their health and well-being benefits—with an eye toward meeting a wider range of employees’ needs.
Join our virtual care experts <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/5205622837990343772]]> to hear their most important strategic considerations when designing high-value employee benefits packages, including: - How integrated virtual care delivers a more positive experience—and greater value—than point solutions - The role virtual primary care plays in addressing the challenges within the current state of healthcare - Real-world examples of how virtual primary care promotes cost management and improves outcomes and access to care Featured Teladoc Health speakers: Rob Bressler Senior Vice President, Virtual Primary Care Dr. Glen Davis Vice President, Clinical Programs Nabomita Dutta (Moderator) Senior Vice President, Commercial Strategy and Partnerships About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
